overview: Randeep, a successful advertising executive, is in turmoil as his boss Neeraj, dismisses a same-sex ad film idea proposed by his junior colleague Rashi. He senses a deep sense of homophobia and sets into deep introspection about his own sexuality. What if his boss or colleagues find out that 'he is gay'. In the cold corporate corridors reeking of misogyny, hostility, stigma and discrimination, will Randeep find his voice...?!
title: Cover Story
